name: Tier 1 Melee Fumbles (Levels 1-4)
description: Fumble effects for melee attacks at Tier 1 (Levels 1-4). Effects are relatively mild for novice adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - You stumble slightly but recover quickly with no additional penalty.
Off Balance - Your wild swing throws you off balance. Your next attack has disadvantage.
Strained Muscle - You overextend and pull a muscle. Take 1d4 damage.
Weapon Slips - Your weapon slips in your grip. You must use your bonus action to readjust your hold or have disadvantage on your next attack.
Trip Over Feet - You stumble over your own feet. You fall prone.
Opening Created - Your clumsy attack leaves you exposed. The target can make an opportunity attack against you.
Embarrassing Miss - Your pathetic swing draws mocking laughter. You have disadvantage on Intimidation checks against creatures that witnessed this until you score a critical hit.
Wild Swing - Your uncontrolled swing might hit an ally within 5 feet (DM's choice). Roll attack against ally's AC; on hit, deal normal weapon damage.

dorman-lakelys-crit-fumble-tables.failEffect: Hit nearby ally for weapon damage
